website_summaries.verdict: The super-sized Hulk Hot Wheels car sporting a pair of big green fists is more than enough to win over hardcore Avengers fans, making this an excellent gift set.
pros: Set of imaginatively designed cars themed after the Hulk, Iron Man, Hawkeye, Captain America, and Thor
cons: Note these are the same size as all other Hot Wheels cars

customer_reviews.title: For my grandsons birthday
customer_reviews.text: I like how the ho wheels cars are presented, very enticing. I know the Hot Wheels brand, have been purchasing since I was young (even when they were known as Matchbook cars) (I am now 66 years old). These Avengers car set is for the grandson’s 6th birthday this coming November 25 (2019). He is a big Avengers fan, and I know he’ll get many hours of funtIme play with them. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn A Coffey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Avenger fans who like Hot Wheels
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved these cars! The only reason I gave a 4 instead of 5 is because two of the cars are too large to use on his Hot Wheels track.
customer_reviews.author: MileHighSunshine

customer_reviews.title: It's the Avengers in car form!!! So cool
customer_reviews.text: You can get different Hot Wheels cars that have more for less money but these were super cool Avengers themed cars Thor has is little Hammer Hawkeye has a bow the Hulk is literally the car you see his fists super cool and he is bigger than any other Hot Wheel Captain America is kind of plain I feel like they could have done more but it does have his shield and Iron Man also super cool looks like Iron Man suit transformed into a car
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Packaging isn't the best
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my nephew and the packaging isn't the biggest problem because he will just get them out to play with them but for the price I figured they would've been in pristine condition
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: sturdy weight and nicely designed
customer_reviews.text: Cute. Grandson loved them. They are just a bit larger than matchbox cars. They seemed a bit pricey since you can get a regular matchbox or hotwheel car for $1, but these do seem to be a bit heavier and well built, and of course, they are the Avengers, so Grandson loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed8x

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday gift for my 4 years old. He loves the Avengers. He really likes cars as well. So this was a win-win. He really enjoys playing with them and loves they are his favorite characters.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Allshouse

customer_reviews.title: Durable but not meant for younger children
customer_reviews.text: My son is 3 years and 8 months old and he is at that age where he loves cars. He can identify which super hero belongs to which car. I would be cautious with this if you have younger children as there are small parts on the vehicles which can come undone. So far they are holding up very well to his use. It arrived on time and everything was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Energy Evans

customer_reviews.title: Marvel Motors!
customer_reviews.text: What kid doesn't like toy cars like these? To have their favorite character's cars and act out story lines is what all kids want to do. This was a gift and I am told it is enjoyed by the boy.
customer_reviews.author: BGuevara

customer_reviews.title: Hot Wheels + Avengers = Success
customer_reviews.text: I meant for these to be a Christmas gift and opened the outer box within eyesight of my 4 year old by mistake. At that point, there was no going back. These are well-made Hot Wheels cars with a theme. My 2 and 4 year old love them and raced them around the house all night. Hawkeye is more difficult for them to recognize, but it's a nice addition to the set.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my nephew. Box was easy to wrap and the Hot Wheels themselves are as durable as ever. Makes for a great gift for kids that are into these type things.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_W

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged, the plastic is cut open. supose to be a gift, not happy. Wouldnt reccomend if your buying as gift. Cute cars though.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cars.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old son hasn't put these down since he got them two weeks ago. He even sleeps with them. I must say they have also put up with some pretty bad abuse, my nephew threw one at a moving car that ran over it n it's still looks like it's in mint condition.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn girl

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived with the box damaged
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived and the cars themselves look to be damaged-free, but the box holding the cars is broken. Since the gift is going to a five-year-old, I don't think he'll mind, but it was frustrating to receive an item in a crushed package. 4 stars, one removed for the damaged packaging.
customer_reviews.author: tkra

customer_reviews.title: Doubles,  missing hawkeye
customer_reviews.text: The set I ordered came with two Captain America cars and zero hawkeye. It's for my 2 year son for Christmas so it's not a HUGE deel, still fairly displeasing.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly Fun
customer_reviews.text: My little guys love these! They're colorful and bright. They travel pretty quickly when pushed on tile or wood. It's incredibly fun to have these as they so fit their Avengers counterparts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Are you kidding me
customer_reviews.text: Way too small these are miniature cars definitely don’t look like the pictures way too small to give as a gift very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Surinaga

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love the set. I would buy a pack again with different cars in it. He plays with them all the time. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Duff

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with quality & price
customer_reviews.text: My nephew is a Hulk freak. When he saw the Hulk truck his eye lit up. Worth every penny for that look.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Lam

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old loved the cars
customer_reviews.text: The headline is all that has to be said, the 4 yr old loved the cars.
customer_reviews.author: david f.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son, and he still a baby, I didn’t even use them. But the quality looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Swent

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young boys
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a friend's son who loves the Avengers. He loves the cars. Great item.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son, at 2, is already a superhero fanatic. These were perfect for his first real set of cars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great, did not even rust!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves bath toys but all bath toys are for babies and as she reminds me many times, not just babies like to play in the bath!! Six months later, not even one rust mark ANYWHERE. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Great for Avengers and Cars lovers!
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES these cars that he got to add to his hot wheels collection!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Cara
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly with the race track so I’m very please.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: An Avengers and car lovers must have
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cast metal avengers cars. For a kid who loves cars and avengers this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Badmom

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loved this as one of his b day gifts!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and design
customer_reviews.text: Loved how authentic the cars looked when I received it. My nephew loved the variety of the cars of all his favorite superheroes. The quality was pretty good as well. Will buy more cars from this brand when my son gets alittle older.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K

customer_reviews.title: Fun cars for avenger fanatics
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friends son who loves all things avengers, my son saw it and wanted to play it. Cars are the size of regular hot wheel cars
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: My husband collects and he loved the cars and the box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for boy who loves cars and superheroes
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Took one with him everywhere for the whole next week.
customer_reviews.author: Mohsin

customer_reviews.title: Great toy or collectible
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift for a 3rd birthday. Great for playing with or anyone who collects hot wheels or marvel toys.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Turnbough

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? You cant go wrong with cars for boys that are obssessed with them and marvel characters!
customer_reviews.author: CGC

customer_reviews.title: Built Well... and FAST
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my nephew's birthday. He has many Hot Wheels, but these are his favorites. He says these are heavier, faster, and cooler than all his other cars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I just received the set for a gift to give and the box was sliced apart as if a box cutter cut it. Now I cannot give in the box. Possible return.
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toys
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these cars. He plays with them all the time. I would definitely recommend them and will be buying more sets like these.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved them! It’s a must have in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Some of the cars did not have the wheels on them. My grandson was a little disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and collectors
customer_reviews.text: This set was purchased for a birthday gift, the packaging was smaller than what I expected. The cars themselves were well designed and I'm sure they would have been loved, the packaging was damaged either in packing or in transit so we ended up returning the set. Would be great for boys of all ages or collectors.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the super hero obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to 4 super hero and monster truck obsessed brothers. They clamored over who got what car. Win! My own little boy wants to Star Wars versions of these cars for Christmas.

customer_reviews.title: Cars and Marvel
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Marvel and cars this was a great combination of the 2. He loves them

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collection
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome collection! My 4 year old nephew loves them.

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves playing with these on his tracks. They are perfect.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Of Two Worlds!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a 6 year old as a Christmas gift. He loves Marvel and loves Hot Wheels so to him this was the best gift as it blended both of his favorites. The cars themselves are quite durable.

customer_reviews.text: Hulk car is the reason to get this set. hot wheels always great gifts for kids

customer_reviews.title: Cool Cars!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these cars for a birthday present for a little boy! He loved them because they were not just any car, they were super hero cars!

customer_reviews.title: The pictures looked like the cars were different colors the only one that ...
customer_reviews.text: The pictures looked like the cars were different colors the only one that looked different was the iron man. Very disappointed with this set already had individually bought the cars and ended up with extras because the pictures were misleading.
customer_reviews.author: RaErAe0824

customer_reviews.title: A big hit for my Marvel loving grandson.
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my grandson. He was so excited. The quality was good and the Avenger theme was a major hit with him.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson.....
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson who is a Hot Wheels fan and Marvel characters and movies are a big plus at their house.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad they are sold out!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter loves these. She carrie them in a bag everywhere and loves to tell people whose car is whose. I wanted to buy another set for my grandson, but alas, they are no more.

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for kids who love cars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set! I ordered it for a last minute birthday gift and was a little nervous about it not being enough of a gift (if that makes sense). It was packaged very nicely so I felt it was sufficient. It also came super fast which was great because I ordered it last minute to begin with. Definitely suggest this for the hot wheel lovers in your life!

customer_reviews.title: Great product!

product_meta.title: Hot Wheels Marvel Avengers Assemble Avengers 5-Pack [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Earth’s mightiest heroes are back in an all-new Hot Wheels character car 5-pack! Iron Man, Hulk, Thor, Captain America and Hawkeye feature iconic superhero decos, body styles and captivating details. Kids will want to collect them all and re-create epic battles from the film. Each pack sold separately, subject to availability. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: Re-create epic battles with Earth’s mightiest heroes.
Each has superhero-inspired authentic decos and details.
Kids will want to collect them all (each pack sold separately).

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,084 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
